description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A Fishbowl is a small world. Battle it out between your friends or family. Race for food, while avoiding mines, and gaining power ups to be the first to satisfy your hunger. Do you have what it takes to survive the bowl?
description.short: A Fishbowl is a small world. Battle it out between your friends or family. Race for food, while avoiding mines, and gaining power ups to be the first to satisfy your hunger. Do you have what it takes to survive the bowl?
